App Settings
Gmail Auto-Import (Global)
Scan stay@hostizzy.com for all property bookings
Not Connected
email@gmail.com
Last scan: Never
Auto-Scan Emails
Check for new bookings every 2 hours
First-time Setup Required
Before connecting Gmail:

1. Go to Google Cloud Console
2. Create a new project (or select existing)
3. Enable "Gmail API"
4. Create OAuth 2.0 credentials (Web application)
5. Add authorized redirect URI: https://your-domain.com
6. Copy Client ID and paste below

How it works:
Gmail scans stay@hostizzy.com for booking confirmation emails from Airbnb, Booking.com, Agoda, MakeMyTrip, etc. Properties are auto-detected from email content.

How to get iCal URL from Airbnb/OTAs
Airbnb:
Go to Listing Availability Export Calendar Copy iCal Link

Booking.com:
Extranet Calendar Sync Calendar Copy iCal URL

Other OTAs:
Look for "Calendar Export", "iCal Sync", or "Calendar URL" in settings
